sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {
    Box,
    Text,
    useColorModeValue
} from '@chakra-ui/react'

import Switcher from './switcher'

function Header(props){
    const titleText = useColorModeValue(wtBlackText, dtWhiteText);
    return(
        <Box
        as= 'div'
        w="full"
        h="130px"
        display="flex"
        direction="inline-flex"
        justifyContent="space-between">
            <Box
            display="flex"
            flexFlow="column"
            justifyContent="center">
                <Text
                fontWeight='black'
                fontSize="xl"
                color="hsl(230, 17%, 14%)"
                mb={2}>Social Media Dashboard</Text>
                <Text
                color="hsl(228, 12%, 44%)"
                fontSize="sm"
                fontWeight="bold">Total Followers: 23,004</Text>
            </Box>
            <Box 
            display="flex"
            flexFlow="row"
            justifyContent="center"
            alignItems="center"
            >
                <Switcher />
            </Box>
        </Box>
    )
}


export default Header
